Dear Mr. Gonzalez:
Your Child Placing Agency certificate of authorization license is renewed. It is valid only
at your present address and is nontransferable. If you move, please notify us at least
30 days in advance.
You will be receiving the certificate of authorization in the mail. Please review it for
accuracy.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and contact me with any
questions. In the event that I am not available, and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please contact Claudia Triestram, the area manager at (616) 552-3662.
Sincerely,

III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
The agency is in compliance with all applicable licensing statutes and rules.
IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
The facility was offered technical assistance in the following areas
 The agency was documenting foster parent involvement in policies each year
in social work contacts and case notes. It was discussed that they should also
have the foster parent sign the document each time.
V. CONSULTATION
The facility did not request consultation.
VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this licensing
period.
The agency was not required to submit any corrective action plans during this past
year.
VII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing
statutes and rules and/or MSA requirements and/or contract and policy. It is
recommended that the facility be issued a renewal of their regular license.
